Structure# CAEmitterLayerEmitterMode

iOS 5.0+iPadOS 5.0+Mac Catalyst 13.1+macOS 10.6+tvOS 9.0+visionOS 1.0+

```
struct CAEmitterLayerEmitterMode
```

[`init(rawValue: String)`](/documentation/quartzcore/caemitterlayeremittermode/init(rawvalue:))### [Type Properties](/documentation/quartzcore/caemitterlayeremittermode#Type-Properties)

[`static let outline: CAEmitterLayerEmitterMode`](/documentation/quartzcore/caemitterlayeremittermode/outline)Particles are emitted from the outline of the particle emitter.[`static let points: CAEmitterLayerEmitterMode`](/documentation/quartzcore/caemitterlayeremittermode/points)Particles are emitted from points on the particle emitter.[`static let surface: CAEmitterLayerEmitterMode`](/documentation/quartzcore/caemitterlayeremittermode/surface)Particles are emitted from the surface of the particle emitter.[`static let volume: CAEmitterLayerEmitterMode`](/documentation/quartzcore/caemitterlayeremittermode/volume)Particles are emitted from the a position within the particle emitter.## [Relationships](/documentation/quartzcore/caemitterlayeremittermode#relationships)
